function.name: airConditioningMode_setValue
function.description: This function is used to activate a specific operation mode on an air conditioner using voice commands.

location.description: The location where the air conditioner is located. e.g. home, office, etc.

room.description: The room where the air conditioner is located. e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

device.description: The name of the air conditioner whose operation mode needs to be set. e.g. AC1, standing air conditioner, etc.

mode.description: The specific mode of the air conditioner to be activated. e.g. auto, windfree, ai comfort zone, etc.
